divs: sighting detailsi was watching westward from my patio again like last night when i noticed a star like light coming from the western night sky, i observed for about 10 15 seconds and ran in to tell my wife to come and see, when we returned to the patio we both seen the starlight smoothly gliding towards us but then it took a gradual but definite southerly direction and seconds later it began to dissipate, the light becoming smaller, upon disappearing there was a red burn flash, and it was gone, interesting to note though was before it took a turn to the south there was a flight that had taken off from sky harbor heading in a westerly north direction and i know the pilot \ passergers had to have seen it.
